meanings.definition: A breed of domestic cat originating in Thailand, known for its distinctive markings and blue almond-shaped eyes.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor has a beautiful Siamese cat with striking blue eyes.
meanings.sent2: The Siamese cat meowed loudly for attention.
meanings.sent3: The Siamese cat tried to play hide-and-seek but couldn't hide its bright blue eyes.
meanings.sent4: The Siamese cat's markings were like a work of art on its fur.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the elegant Siamese cat I saw at the pet store.

meanings.definition: A type of conjoined twin born with their bodies connected at a certain point.
meanings.sent1: The Siamese twins were born connected at the hip.
meanings.sent2: Doctors successfully separated the Siamese twins in a delicate surgery.
meanings.sent3: The Siamese twins always had to coordinate their movements to avoid tripping each other.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was so strong, it was as if the Siamese twins shared a heart.
meanings.sent5: The story of the Siamese twins touched the hearts of many around the world.
